text.headline: War and Peace Character Map
text.text: Explore the progression of Tolstoy's masterpiece, chapter by chapter. A spoil-as-you-go guide to keep track of the maze of characters

text.headline: Introduction of Pierre
text.text: Pierre Bezukhov is introduced as the awkward heir to a fortune.

text.headline: Napoleon Invades Russia
text.text: The French army marches into Russian territory, leading to a pivotal moment in the story.
